In the Media

Stories · Mentions · Folklore

Appearances

  • Community radio segments on canopy hydrology and the “arboreal fish.”
  • Trail newsletters covering citizen science contributions.
  • Art exhibits featuring moss pools and speculative fish ladders.

Have a sighting clip or news mention? Email media@treetrout.org.
